faq.question: Are your jackets made from genuine leather?
faq.answer: Yes, all our jackets are made from 100% premium full-grain leather.

faq.question: How should I care for my leather jacket?
faq.answer: Use a leather conditioner once every 3 months and avoid direct sunlight for long periods.

faq.question: Do you ship internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship globally with reliable courier partners.

faq.question: Can I return a product if it doesn’t fit?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer hassle-free exchanges and returns within 14 days.

journey.title: 2025 Updates
journey.subtitle: Our Journey from Chayan's MCA Project to the present day. ://echoware.co.in [Multi Tenant Ecommerce (Industry Grade)] | this one [opensource]

content.text: The one youre seeing rn is an opensource, normal ecommerce, that is built for speed and scalability.unlike echoware this isnt multi teanant, it is a single tenant ecommerce, this is opensource, so you can use it how ever fuck you want, im not responsible for anything that happens to your business. you control everything, every fucking thing.

After my breakup i thought i should do something, so i started with version 4 & 5, i kept the event driven system, changed the ui/ux, added whatsapp as layout, made the website more responsive and user friendly, added a lot of features, and made the website more secure and scalable. we use low level abis for encryption and decryption of sensitive client data. we have our own finetuned llm so that we can process customers messages and serve them in natural language on whatsapp.
features: ✅ Launched our own whatsapp ecommerce platform.
✅ Added a lot of features to the website.
✅ Made the website more secure and scalable.
✅ Added a lot of features to the website.
✅ Low level abis for encryption and decryption of sensitive client data.

content.text: Version 2, was too young like a little girls pussy, good for taste, but cant use it for its untablity. I started with version 4, removed the microfrontends, distributed system was turned in event driven systems, which became the eventual complete solution.

media.title: Event Driven Systems
media.description: Event Driven Systems are a type of software architecture that is designed to handle events in a scalable and efficient way. It is a type of architecture that is designed to handle events in a scalable and efficient way.

media.title: Mature Systems, Mature Problems
media.description: Beautiful code, but still not a mature system.

content.text: Nrix started with a small motive to sell ecommerce so that me(sourav) and chayan can sell platforms to small businesses thats why this is multi tenant ecommerce, this is the beginning of our journey. we started with version 1 as chayans MCA project, version 2 was beoynd its time, we used microfrontneds, and distributed systems, micro frontnends were just a research topic when i started coding, withing 2 weeks the code was done, next 2 weeks were modifying and decorating.

media.title: Our Crafting Process

features: ✅ Created Api Gateway for all the microservices.
✅ Started selling platforms to small businesses
